targets.query:
from(bucket: "kafka_data")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "financial_transactions" and r._field == "amount")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "sum")

from(bucket: "kafka_data")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "web_logs" and r._field == "responseTime")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

panels.title: Average Response Time of Web Requests

targets.query:
from(bucket: "kafka_data")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "iot_sensors" and r._field == "temperature")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "kafka_data")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "iot_sensors" and r._field == "humidity")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

panels.title: Temperature and Humidity Levels Over Time
